press_release.title: ScrollIntel Launches Revolutionary AI CTO Platform, Democratizing Executive-Level Technical Leadership
press_release.lead_paragraph: ScrollIntel today announced the public launch of its groundbreaking AI-powered CTO replacement platform, offering businesses of all sizes access to executive-level technical leadership and decision-making capabilities without the traditional costs and constraints of hiring a human CTO.

key_quotes.speaker: CEO, ScrollIntel
key_quotes.quote: We're not just automating tasks - we're democratizing access to world-class technical leadership. Every startup and growing business can now have a CTO-level AI that makes strategic technical decisions, optimizes systems, and drives innovation.

key_quotes.speaker: Early Beta User
key_quotes.quote: ScrollIntel's AI CTO has transformed how we approach technical decisions. It's like having a seasoned technical executive who never sleeps and continuously optimizes our entire technology stack.

market_context.problem: The average CTO salary exceeds $300,000 annually, making executive technical leadership inaccessible to most growing businesses
market_context.solution: ScrollIntel's AI CTO provides the same strategic capabilities at a fraction of the cost, with 24/7 availability and continuous learning
market_context.market_size: The global CTO services market is valued at $2.1 billion and growing at 15% annually
